statements: UPDATE RestaurantReviews SET rating = 4.5, review_text = 'Excellent food and service' WHERE review_id = 101;
UPDATE RestaurantReviews SET review_text = 'Average experience, can be improved', rating = 3.0 WHERE city = 'New York';
UPDATE RestaurantReviews SET rating = 4.5, city = 'New York' WHERE review_id = 101 AND user_id = 201 AND restaurant_id = 301;
UPDATE RestaurantReviews SET city = 'Los Angeles', rating = 3.8, review_text = 'Great food and atmosphere' WHERE user_id = 202 AND rating < 4.0;
UPDATE restaurant_reviews SET rating = 4.5 WHERE review_id = 101
